value:
$WmMPID_幼少エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Before01,Face|I see... So you were raised on the
plains, Lyn? I've never been to Sacae,
so I can't even imagine what it's like.$k$p$WmMPID_リン,ch03_38_Mark_NF_Pair,Face|It's different from the cities you're
used to, but amazing all the same.
I hope you'll visit someday...$k$pErm, Eliwood, was it?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Before01,Face|Indeed. Thank you for the invitation,
Lyn. Was I correct in hearing your
friend's name is Mark?$k$p$WmMPID_リン,ch03_38_Mark_NF_Pair,Face|That's right. We were both whisked
away here by some unknown force.$k$pOh! I should mention that Mark is an
aspiring tactician.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Before01,Face|Dang, that's impressive. You've gotta
be pretty smart to do a job like that.$k$p$WmMPID_リン,ch03_38_Mark_NF_Pair,Face|Of course! Mark has enough brains
for the both of us.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Before01,Face|Why do you say that like you're
bragging?$k$p$WmMPID_リン,ch03_38_Mark_NF_Pair,Face|Well... Mark isn't exactly the talkative
type. And there's such a thing as too
much...uh, mudesty...$k$p$WmMPID_幼少エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Before01,Face|Might you mean "modesty"?$k$p$WmMPID_リン,ch03_38_Mark_NF_Pair,Face|Right! Too much modesty!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Before01,Face|Bwahaha, sounds like you don't
enjoy hitting the books any more
than I do, huh, Lyn?$k$p$WmMPID_リン,ch03_38_Mark_NF_Pair,Face|Hey, speak for yourself! And just how
was that funny? Come on, Mark, let's
get out of here.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ヘクトル,ch03_05_Hector_M_Before01,Face|Hey, wait, I was just... Bah, they're
gone.$k$pWhy'd she get so worked up over
that? Talk about an overreaction.
Right, Eliwood?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少エリウッド,ch03_06_Eliwod_M_Before01,Face|Hm...$k$p$Sbs8000|$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_リン,ch03_38_Mark_NF_Pair,Face|$Fi1500|I'm sorry, Mark. We finally found
some potential friends and things
were going so well... But I...$k$pI was taught how to ride a horse and
swing a sword on the plains, but
that's far from a formal education.$k$pI learned from the people in my tribe,
unlike those two, who had teachers,
textbooks, and classrooms.$k$pI can't help but feel embarrassed
when everyone else seems to know
things that I don't.$k$pEliwood and Hector are the children
of nobles, right? Our lives must be so
different...$k$pYou know, suddenly I can't shake the
feeling that I may not be able to get
along with them after all...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_リン,ch03_38_Mark_NF_Pair,Face|Hm? Something feels off... Oh!
Mark, get down!$k$p$SspSE_BATTLE_BOW_SHOT1|$Fo500,255,255,255,255|$Fi500|$w0|$SbpBGM_MNS_FE07_03,0|$WmMPID_幼少レベッカ,ch03_13_Rebacca_F_Before01,Face|Oh no! I'm so sorry, I didn't think
anyone was around here!$k$pAre you all right? Please say you're
all right!$k$p$WmMPID_幼少ルセア,ch03_11_Ruthea_M_Before01,Face|Rebecca, let this be a lesson to
remind you why you must confirm
your target before shooting...$k$p$WmMPID_リン,ch03_38_Mark_NF_Pair,Face|Good thing we ducked—that aim was
spot-on. I'm guessing you were the
one who shot that arrow?$k$p$WmMPID_幼少レベッカ,ch03_13_Rebacca_F_Before01,Face|Yeah... I thought I'd practice my
archery by doing some hunting
here, just like back home.$k$p$WmMPID_リン,ch03_38_Mark_NF_Pair,Face|Ah, you're a hunter. I see... Do you
mind if I ask you more about that?$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_幼少レベッカ,ch03_13_Rebacca_F_Before01,Face|Oh wow, so you and your tribe hunt
on horseback? That's so cool!$k$p$WmMPID_リン,ch03_38_Mark_NF_Pair,Face|Your method is just as interesting! It's
hard to imagine hunting in the forest.
I'm too used to the open plains.$k$p$WmMPID_幼少レベッカ,ch03_13_Rebacca_F_Before01,Face|It's not so bad once you get used to
it. Hey, what exactly did you hunt on
the plains?$k$p$Sbs150|
